projectGridLines.title: 4 Projects
projectGridLines.description:
-Project 1

Title: Document Onboarding Pipelines

Description: You will be part of a collaborative team working on both backend and frontend development using Java/Python and ReactJS technologies. This role offers an exciting opportunity to contribute to the entire software development lifecycle and significantly impact our products. Develop and maintain scalable data ingestion pipelines to ingest large volumes of documents efficiently and reliably from various sources on the web.


Skill sets: React, Python, Java

Traits expectation: Curious to explore, Go-getter

Expected learning: Design, Microservices, Cloud Services

Specific courses required for project execution:  Should be hands-on with coding in React and (Python or Java)

Project 2

Title: Document Pipelines Orchestration and Monitoring

Description: Monitor and orchestrate highly performant pipelines which processes millions of documents each month using Java/Python. Develop and maintain scalable data ingestion pipelines to ingest large volumes of documents efficiently and reliably from various sources on the web.


Skill sets: Python, Java

Traits expectation: Curious to explore, Go-getter

Expected learning: Design, Microservices, Cloud Services

Specific courses required for project execution:  Should be hands-on with coding in python or Java

Project 3

Title: Build data table and visualization widgets in the Dashboard product


Description: AlphaSense has a dashboard product where users can see different types of data sets for companies they research. This project will involve building more widgets and increase the capability of the Dashboard

Skill sets: Python, Java, ReactJS

Traits expectation: Humble, Hungry, Smart

Expected learning: Backend Development, Databases, Frontend Design, CI/CD

Specific courses required for project execution:  

Project 4

Title: Build integrations with 3rd party platforms


Description: We want to allow our users to link their 3rd party data sources like Cloud Drives, Chat Applications, CRMs etc with AlphaSense and run the AlphaSense search and AI features on their own data. In this project, we will be expanding the number of integrations we support.

Skill sets: Python, React JS

Traits expectation: Humble, Hungry, Smart

Expected learning: Backend Development, Databases, Frontend Design, CI/CD

Specific courses required for project execution:
